children.label: Show controls for each heading level
children.name: heading_toggle

children.label: Padding
children.name: padding
children.help_text: Applies to all text fields and dropdown select fields. Does not apply to checkbox, radio, GDPR text, and rich text fields.

children.label: Border
children.name: border
children.help_text: Applies to all text fields and dropdown select fields. Does not apply to checkbox, radio, GDPR text, and rich text fields.

children.label: Checkbox/radio
children.name: checkbox_radio
children.help_text: Controls form checkbox/radio fields and GDPR checkbox fields

children.label: Font
children.name: font
children.help_text: Controls form checkbox/radio field and GDPR checkbox field item fonts

children.label: GDPR text
children.name: gdpr_text
children.help_text: Controls the paragraph content of GDPR fields

children.label: Background color
children.name: blog_banner_bg_color
children.help_text: The banner's background color will be used as the solid background unless a background image is set. In this case, the color will be used as a fallback color to the banner image

children.label: Blog listing banner image
children.name: listing_bg
children.help_text: Background image used on the blog listing page for all blogs using the 'Session - blog listing' template
